p: hiPSC clones growing on MEFs were detached from the well with collagenase IV (Thermo Fisher Scientific) and plated in ultra-low-attachment plates (Corning Incorporated), in iPS medium without b-FGF. The medium was changed every three days; after seven days, EBs were transferred into a 0.1% gelatin pre-coated 6-well plate with DMEM 10% FBS 1% penicillinâ€“streptomycin, 2 mM Glutamax (all from Thermo Fisher Scientific).
